message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd be interested in.  I'm offering it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, but I'm also open to hearing your thoughts on the price. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
